text: Gary Cedric Beacock (born 22 January 1960) is an English former professional footballer who played as a midfielder. ==References== Category:1960 births Category:Living people Category:Sportspeople from Scunthorpe Category:English footballers Category:Association football midfielders Category:Sheffield United F.C. players Category:Grimsby Town F.C. players Category:Hereford United F.C. players Category:Cheltenham Town F.C. players Category:English Football League players
title: Gary Beacock
